custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT news.* FROM News_News news JOIN News_NewsPopulation pop ON news.newsId = pop.newsId LEFT JOIN News_NewsRead newsread on news.newsId = newsread.newsId WHERE news.publicationDate < ? AND ((pop.groupId IN ([$GROUP_IDS$]) AND pop.roleId IN ([$ROLE_IDS$]) AND news.expirationDate > ?) OR news.authorId = ?) [$OTHER$] GROUP BY news.newsId ORDER BY news.publicationDate DESC LIMIT ?

SELECT count(DISTINCT news.newsId) as totalCount FROM News_News news JOIN News_NewsPopulation pop ON news.newsId = pop.newsId LEFT JOIN News_NewsRead newsread on news.newsId = newsread.newsId WHERE news.publicationDate < ? AND ((pop.groupId IN ([$GROUP_IDS$]) AND pop.roleId IN ([$ROLE_IDS$]) AND news.expirationDate > ?) OR news.authorId = ?) [$OTHER$]

SELECT DISTINCT news.* FROM News_News news JOIN News_NewsPopulation pop ON news.newsId = pop.newsId LEFT JOIN News_NewsRead newsread on news.newsId = newsread.newsId WHERE news.publicationDate between ? AND ? AND news.isSchoolNews = 0 AND ((pop.groupId IN ([$GROUP_IDS$]) AND pop.roleId IN ([$ROLE_IDS$]) AND news.expirationDate > ?) OR news.authorId = ?) GROUP BY news.newsId ORDER BY news.publicationDate DESC LIMIT ?
